programme.title: Electoral debates past and present
programme.short_synopsis: How can a televised debate change the public perception of a politician?
programme.medium_synopsis: The history of electoral debates from Lincoln to Clinton and the power of public perception in the run up to the 1992 US presidential election.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
